name: Project Godrise Demo
description: Project Godrise is a 2D action platformer game with a combat and ability system.  Fight your way through various enemies to complete each level.  Players can upgrade their stats and acquire new skills and abilities.  The game supports 4 player local cooperative play.  This is a demo version and only the first 5 levels are available to play. If there is enough interest for the title, I might keep working on it. Hope you enjoy as it was a lot of fun to make.     -- In Development --
